column5: Awesome score! Enjoy!
Nice catch!
Geebus, great looking perch!
Right on. Perch.
nice haul of perch congrats...pm sent
Now there's a nice feast.  Well done

THANKS guys and gals....but it's really nothing that special....more of a tease to get you out from behind them there computers and behind your gunnels to catch some fish.......now go CATCH a FISH...  Bob

Fished from about 8am till noon and between the 2 of us we caught 33 jumbo Lake Erie perch...largest 14" caught by my partner John...he had the hot hand yesterday...  First spot we anchored we caught about a dozen and decided to move in a little before calling it quits....the slight move payed off in big dividends (perch)....other boats started to creep in on us but it was no use...we had the once forbidden bait because I made a special run on Friday to the Niagara River and dipped my own Lake Erie Emerald Shiners....when we left we gave our extra bait away to the 3 sorry souls in the boat closest to us...they bought golden shiners from the bait store near the launch...BIG MISTAKE....here's hoping all our bait shops switch over to the "GOOD STUFF"  soon...    Fishing depths and exact locations available upon PM requests only.  Now go catch a fish, Bob
I don't leave without the "GOOD STUFF"
Now there is some nice fertilizer    looks like a nice day out there Billy
Big belly perch you got there...
nice!
Wow.  Now that's a Pail-o-perch.  Holly smokes..
Excellent day on the water Bob.Y cant beat a day fishing with Good friends.I'll be posting later about my day with MM yesterday. Glad you had a great time
Let me guess...you carped out and went walleye fishing...
well done on perching, looks like a great day by the two of you!...
No better freshwater fish to eat, Bob!  Nice going, hope to hit our side of the lake again soon for some more of those tasty beauties. That 14" is really nice.

Honey ! put the Bass back in the fridge , Billys got some real nice perch he wants to share ............. lol ....lol . They sure are nice ,  if thats how my day would have went yesterday but i just could'nt land on 'em no where it seemed . Great catch of fish boys .
Placing them in buckets is very harmful to the fish.... putting them in your stomach is just cruel.
Nice perch porn Billy Bob  :thumbsup_anim:    I'm hoping to hit my honey hole for the first time next Sunday.  Enjoy the fish fry.
do you offer guiding services? (serious question)
Sure...
Holy ssschmokes....fat perch there BB.  If they grew that big here i might even be tempted to eat one....lol.
Those are some serious perch...well done!
Hmm, looks like this "Lake Erie" as you call it has some nice fish and would be a great new spot to try out....
ahaha i agree
Damn....I not suppose to reveal the lake....folks it's just a average lake somewhere on the planet...
Im running up to peterborough to get the boat. And a white bucket.  Nice going on those perch billybob!!!!
Nice hual! i think i saw you guyz out there just off waverly shoal, we had a bass tourny out the that day, tough day for bass with the east wind!
~~~Great report bud, you guys did as well as I did on Simcoe, but your Jumbo was larger
The week before I was off Waverly Shoals fishing not catching walleyes...this past Saturday I went out of the Catt....
how much for a days trip for 3?
